attributes.action: ensure that since the Olympics were famously won for London they will be paid for only by London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They bid for the Olympics for London, said they won it for London, and London is benefitting from the extra loss of blue collar workplaces and redevelopment infrastructure, with national taxpayer's money. London must therefore pay for the Olympics itself, with all compliance, security and accomodation included.
